verses.roman:
hena-kāle prabhu āilā tāṅhāre milite
cāle śloka dekhi prabhu lāgilā paḍite

synonyms: hena-kāle—at that time; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; āilā—came there; tāṅhāre milite—to meet him; cāle—in the thatched roof; śloka—verse; dekhi—seeing; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; lāgilā—began; paḍite—to read.
translation: At that time, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went there to meet him, and when He saw the leaf pushed into the roof and saw the verse, He began to read it.
